headline: HCA Healthcare and the HCA Healthcare Foundation Strengthen Collaboration with the American Heart Association to Advance Cardiovascular and Stroke Care, Clinical Research and Education
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., September 10, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, and the HCA Healthcare Foundation today announced they will continue their collaboration with the American Heart Association on their Getting to the Heart of Stroke™ initiative through $3.9 million in funding and support. This builds upon the collaboration announced in 2022 focused on deepening the heart-brain connection to help treat, beat and prevent stroke. Together, the Am
